short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to click a button to open up an Amazon book in Goodreads.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ever been on an Amazon page, looking at a book, and think "Hrm, I'd love to read that. I should add it to my Goodreads" but can't find an easy way to do that? Click this extension and it will do a search in Goodreads based on the ISBN and bring you to the Goodreads page for the book. There, you can add it, see additional reviews, or see if you've already read it!
